tier_2_material.victim_details: Abdul Hameed, resident of village Dosni

tier_3_contextual.circumstances_of_killing: The accused shot the victim in his courtyard after an altercation about jaggery
tier_3_contextual.incident_location: Courtyard of Abdul Hameed's residence, village Dosni

residual_details.additional_facts: The High Court confirmed the judgment of the Sessions Court. The appellant was convicted under section 302 r/w 34 IPC. The Sessions Court acquitted the appellant of the offence under section 25/27 of the Arms Act. The victim was declared dead at the Government Hospital, Laksar.
